excerpt: A delicious vegan alternative to the classic meatball sub sandwich.
instructions: Slice the sub rolls in half, lengthwise, and place them on a baking sheet.
Spread a layer of marinara sauce on each half of the sub rolls.
Arrange the vegan meatballs on top of the marinara sauce.
Sprinkle the shredded vegan mozzarella cheese over the meatballs.
Bake the subs in the oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove the subs from the oven and sprinkle the chopped basil over the top.
